title: MLBucket List
author: Nadia Bahrami, Shelly Yusuf, Paul Sheridan, Kate Zurlo-Cuva
body: A website developed as part of a 5-day sprint with three other students that utilizes the Google API to chart a path to visit as many Major League Baseball stadiums as you wish in a season. The project also logs user data that persists locally.

title: Bus Mall Site
author: Kate Zurlo-Cuva
body: Fun with tables, chart.js, and JavaScript forms/events.

title: Salmon Cookies
author: Kate Zurlo-cuva
body: An exercise in client-based project development.
